name: Grapple! (Taximan981)
description:
Part of the GMTK 2021 Game Jam, Grapple! is a game about a circle with a moral dilemma, for the circle finds a cube with no way to move... The circle has his trusty grappling hook and can choose to fly through the level alone or connect with the cube (literally). The cube makes life difficult but hey, the real journey are the friends we make along the way.

Controls:

Hold Space to attach to nearest triangle

Left click to Boost UP : Right Click to Boost Right
